title: Ep 95 | How Phil Robertson Met His Daughter
description:
For the first time ever, Phil publicly reveals that he has a daughter. The story of how Phil came to know her is one of grace, love, redemption, and what it means to be a believer. Al, Jase, Willie, and Jep speak candidly about what it was like to find out about the sister they never knew they had. Jump to 28:15 to hear their stories.
